Room.Name: Dining and Recreation Area
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large room used for small meetings and other entertainment.
Room.LongDescription: This hall is the primary dining area for the servants and guards. The food that is served is typically just leftovers of the food which is served to the mages and their guests. The food is top quality so on one is complaining. This hall is also used for meetings and other gatherings. There's also a card table in one corner and a variety of other entertainment items around.
